sentences.en: Britain's new ambassador to Lebanon has presented his credentials to the President.
sentences.cn: 英国驻黎巴嫩的新任大使已将国书递交给总统。

sentences.en: He leaked the news of the ambassador's visit.
sentences.cn: 他把大使来访的消息泄露出去了.

sentences.en: He took up office as an ambassador for ten years continuously.
His Excellency the Spainish Ambassador is here to see you.
sentences.cn: 西班牙大使阁下来见您.

sentences.en: I was carrying dispatches from the ambassador.
She has now accepted a posting as ambassador to Scandinavia.
sentences.cn: 她现在已接受任命,担任驻斯堪的纳维亚大使.

sentences.en: The ambassador did his utmost to prevent the outbreak of hostilities.
sentences.cn: 这位大使竭尽全力防止战事的爆发.

sentences.en: The Ambassador Hotel is a Los Angeles landmark.
sentences.cn: 国宾大饭店是洛杉矶的地标性建筑之一。

sentences.en: The ambassador personally conveyed the president's message to the king.
sentences.cn: 大使将总统的口信亲自转达给国王.

sentences.en: The ambassador refused to all interviews.
sentences.cn: 该大使拒绝了所有记者对他的采访.

sentences.en: The Ambassador refused to give any interviews to journalists.
The ambassador was clearly disconcerted by the British reaction.
sentences.cn: 显然，英国的反应让这位大使很不安。

sentences.en: The ambassador would not be drawn on questions of a political nature.
sentences.cn: 大使不会对政治问题发表意见。

sentences.en: The new ambassador is more mature than his predecessor.
sentences.cn: 新大使比他的前任更成熟一些.

trans.tran_en: an important official who represents his or her government in a foreign country
an important official who represents his or her government in a foreign country
